abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32444382, pmid32510289, pmid32508261, pmid32444693, pmid32511851, pmid32444480, pmid32444479, pmid32511100, pmid32444466, pmid32444393, pmid32509535, pmid32496106, pmid32510164, pmid32444366, pmid32444371, pmid32511019, pmid32510169, pmid32506621, pmid32446285, pmid32510576, pmid32493814, pmid32511089, pmid32508193, pmid32511867, pmid32484155, pmid32510581, pmid32444504, pmid32506757, pmid32470162, pmid32506184, pmid32507102, pmid32444866, pmid32511042, pmid32510972, pmid32510968, pmid32476633, pmid32444493, pmid32463809, pmid32444412, pmid32444460, pmid32444482, pmid32444481
